createFirstTeam: Create your team or join a team
needValidatedLevel: You need a validated level to create teams. Update your profile to get your level validated.
manageTeams: Manage your teams and view team details
teamNameUnique: Team name must be unique within the selected league
noGroupsAvailable: No groups available in this league
levelMismatch: Your validated level ({{level}}) doesn't match this group's level ({{groupLevel}})
createNewTeam: Create a new team to participate in league play
genderMismatch: Your gender does not match this team's gender requirement
addPlayersDisabled: Cannot add more players. Team is full.
teamAvailabilityModalDescription: Set your team's weekly availability for matches. Choose the days and time ranges when your team can play. (match start time)
teamIncompleteMinPlayers: Team is incomplete. Minimum 2 players required.
teamIncompleteMixedMissingBoth: Team is incomplete. Mixed teams must have at least 1 masculine and 1 feminine player.
teamIncompleteMixedMissingMale: Team is incomplete. Mixed teams must have at least 1 masculine player.
teamIncompleteMixedMissingFemale: Team is incomplete. Mixed teams must have at least 1 feminine player.
availabilityWarningDescription:
Minimum requirement:
- 3 weekdays,
- Play at 21:00 on a weekday or play a weekend day from 9:00 to 12:00.

If you have any questions, please contact the administrator.
joinConfirmationMessage: Are you sure you want to join {{teamName}}?
alreadyMember: You are already a member of this team
genderRequired: Player must have a gender set in their profile
masculineTeamOnly: Masculine teams can only contain male players
feminineTeamOnly: Feminine teams can only contain female players
mixedTeamRequirement: Mixed teams must contain both masculine and feminine players
alreadyOnTeam: Player is already on a Level {{level}} {{gender}} team ({{teamName}})
